channel.title: Screen for the axoloti
channel.description:
Is it possible to buy a pre-made lcd screen for the axoloti which only would require to connect it and software programming to make it work?
I need to program a midi mangler box and the axoloti is better suited for this than an arduino or a raspberry, but I require a screen with at least two text lines.
My programming skills are high, but my knowledge of electronics is limited. Could you give me some suggestions to connect a screen easily?
Thank you very much

item.title: Screen for the axoloti
item.dc:creator: @toneburst alx
item.description:
@toneburst wrote:

+1 (but with an RGB OLED screen, rather than an LCD ).

Read full topic

item.title: Screen for the axoloti
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebastian Cordoves
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

Something like this?

Tiar / SmashedTransistors Contributions

Object tiar/HW/OLED128x64 try the help patch to get an idea: menu: Help -> Library -> Community -> tiar ->HW -> OLED128x64 This object allows to use a 128x64 OLED I2C display (using PB8 and PB9 in I2C mode). [image] if mode == 0 the OLED will display line1, line2, line3 and line4 strings (up to 11 characters) : [image] if mode == 1 the OLED will display line1 and a graph corresponding to the scope object linked in the "scope" parameter: [image] type can be set to SH1106 or SSD1306.â€¦

Read full topic
